gen:link.msg:message: `IncomeFromInvestments` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_IncomeFromInvestments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_IncomeFromInvestments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfIncomeFromInvestmentsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfIncomeFromInvestmentsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfIncomeFromInvestmentsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfIncomeFromInvestmentsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
